narrative.title: 78Th Infantry Division Battleaxe - 1943Q1
narrative.situation: British Infantry Division deployed in North Africa during 1943Q1.
narrative.objectives: First Army infantry division specialized in mountain warfare and set-piece attacks. Veteran Tunisia Campaign division with experience in difficult terrain operations. Known for tenacity and combined-arms coordination.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: Mountainous terrain (Tunisian Dorsale range), narrow valleys, limited road network, muddy tracks

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Mountain warfare expertise developed in Tunisia Campaign

environment.terrain_type: Mountainous terrain (Tunisian Dorsale range), narrow valleys, limited road network, muddy tracks
